original: Arosenius, Carl Fredrik, med. lic., Romanäs, f. 5/9/16 i Vårfrukyrka, Upps. 1., av bankdir. Karl A. o. Signe Flodérus. G. 43 m. Karin Linder. Barn: Karl-Bertil f. 44, Björn 46. — Stud:ex. v. Upps. h. a. 1. 35, med. kand. i Upps. 39 o. med. lic. där 45. E. o. aman. v. hyg.-bakt. inst. i Upps. sex mån 41-44, asisist:läk. v. centr :isanat. i Upps. sex mån. 45-46, und :läk. v. Romanäs sanat. sed. 46. Led. av Sv:es iläk:förb., Enköpings-Kamraterna o. UppiS. medicinares fören.
translated: Arosenius, Carl Fredrik, medical licentiate, Romanäs, born on 5/9/16 in Vårfrukyrka, Uppsala county, son of bank director Karl A. and Signe Flodérus. Married in 1943 to Karin Linder. Children: Karl-Bertil born in 1944, Björn born in 1946. He graduated from Uppsala high school in 1935, obtained a bachelor's degree in medicine in Uppsala in 1939, and a medical licentiate degree there in 1945. He served as a trainee at the hygiene and bacteriology institute in Uppsala for six months from 1941-1944, as an assistant physician at the central hospital in Uppsala for six months from 1945-1946, and as an acting physician at Romanäs sanatorium from 1946. He is a member of Swedish medical association, Enköping-Kamraterna and Uppsala medicine students association.
